SummaryEnglish: The story is about three mischievous obake who have taken up different jobs. They mostly cause mischief through their neighborhood. Acchi (Bumper) is a cook who lives in an attic. He enjoys cooking and eating in general. Kocchi (Cutter) is a hairdresser who is very skilled. Socchi (Sally) is the only female of the obake. She enjoys eating sweets.

1.TitleEnglish: アッチのいたずらおばけのまき! / ソッチのぞびぞびぞ〜 のまき

50.TitleEnglish: アッチの おりょうりメニュー のまき / アッチコッチソッチの おともだち のまき
